sent.orig: This year's National Day is different from previous years, most notably a hot-cold.
sent.trans: 今年的国庆与往年有所不同，最明显的是一热一冷。

sent.orig: Curis o'Keefe, he remembered, was notably devout.
sent.trans: 他记得柯蒂斯？奥基夫是非常虔诚的。

sent.orig: Mineral storage-Bones act as reserves of minerals important for the body, most notably calcium and phosphorus.
sent.trans: 4矿物储存-骨担当一些对身体很重要的矿物质的储库，最主要的有钙和磷。

sent.orig: These questions have been raised in many contexts in recent years, notably in the United Nations.
sent.trans: 近年来，许多情况下都出现了这些问题，在联合国尤其如此。

sent.orig: Both these products hae called upon CIRAD researchers' expertise, notably in terms of citrus fruit treatments.
sent.trans: 所有这些加工产品都经过了CIRAD研究专家的鉴定，特别是对柑橘类水果进行了确认。
